talk_1001:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Scare_01>*sniffle*<sp:5:1:0> What I really want... What I really
need is...
talk_1010:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Scare_01>*sniffle*<sp:5:1:0> There's one thing I want no
matter what...
talk_1011:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Sad_01>Hey! <sp:5:1:0>You're going to just LEAVE a girl
crying on her own?<sp:0:4:0>You're just as mean<sp:5:0:0> as everyone says!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700>Well, <sp:5:1:0>now I won't feel guilty for taking...<sp:5:1:0>
talk_1003:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Scare_01>*sniffle*<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>*sniffle* *sniff* Aw...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0000>Hey...<sp:5:1:0> You're Yiga Clan too, right? You
should have realized I was fake-crying.<sp:0:4:0>So, could you...get out of my way?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0100>Anyway, back to business!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Scare_01>Thanks, boo-hoo-hoo...
talk_1004: <sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Scare_01>*sniffle*<sp:0:4:0>...<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0000>You're in the way! Get out of here!
